page.title: 20 A SHOPPING LIST
page.content:
At the local supermarket in June 1985 a bottle of milk cost 23p, a loaf of bread was 43p, 1 pound of cheddar cheese was Â£1.05, 1/2 pound of butter was 52p, 1 pound of minced beef was 99p and a dozen eggs was Â£1.48.
This work was done by class 3A of Askern Sutton Road Middle School, the members of which are Neil Horrobin, Edward Senior, Peter Mordue, Peter Malloy, Mark Faulkner, Glenn Evans, Mark Lewchenko, Christopher Newman, Jonathan Moses, Paul Reilly, Lee Howard, Kai Hannan, Michael Crew, Amanda Deere, Vicky Wheeler, Julie Man, Allison Graham, Adrian Earnshaw, Clare Wakefield, Leann Horrobin, Robert Charlton, Paula Byram, Ann- Marie Mawdsley and Paul Allison (teacher).
